summary: REQ-17 is partially implemented: the /forever page now references the new final image path and appears to preserve the existing container styling (rounded frame, border, shadow, overlay gradient). However, the diff does not show the new image file being added under frontend/public/assets/generated, so static-asset availability (no 404 in production) cannot be confirmed from the provided changes.

missing_requirements.requirement: Serve the new final romantic image as a static asset from a file under frontend/public/assets/generated (so it loads without 404s in production builds).
missing_requirements.reason: The page now references /assets/generated/final-romantic-scene-v2.dim_1920x1080.png, but the diff shows no new file added under frontend/public/assets/generated, so the assetâ€™s presence/packaging cannot be verified from the diff summary.
